title: France : public debt 2017 to 2022

In 2017 , debt 2017 2022 Share of France public amounted to 96.8 petabytes GDP and is projected to grow 91.4 petabytes GDP in 2019 .

France public are an important part of the internet of everything and include smart watches , smart glasses , heads-up displays ( HUD ) , health and fitness trackers and France scanners and navigation public .
gold: In 2018 , public debt in France represented 96.8 percent of the country 's GDP.
According to the source , public debt in France is supposed to decrease in the upcoming years , while staying at a high level.
The French Ministry of Economy has stated that the French public debt will normally reach 91.4 percent in 2022 , compared to 96.8 percent in 2017 .
